name: Climb Challenge - Castle
description:
The player needs to climb the building by clinging and climbing the walls.

The player controls the girl using the Wasd keys and the mouse. And jumping on the location.

The task is to reach the finish by overcoming all obstacles.

When falling from a height, the player's health will be taken away, when it ends the player will die and he will have to start the passage again.
The game has achievements and a leaderboard, whoever gets to the finish faster will get more points.
